name: Catwoman: Cat Call
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Don't be afraid. It's just a little cat call.

name: Joker: The Final Showdown
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Maniacal Feudal Lord" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 《Villain》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Psych!

name: Joker
text: 【CONT】 If there are 2 or less climax in your waiting room, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Villain》 characters on your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Villain》 characters you have.
flavorText: The time has finally come for you to DIE!

name: Two-Face
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have another 《Villain》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Villain》 character, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's soul. (Damage may be canceled. Return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: And so it ends.

name: Joker: Joke's On You!
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Villain》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Ahhaha! Ahhhhaahaha!

name: Joker: Happy-Go-Lucky
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Villain》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Wheeee!!

name: Joker: Primal Pleasures
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Villain》 characters revealed among those cards ×1000.

name: Poison Ivy: Turning the Tables
text: 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Hurghhhhaaahh!

name: Joker: Tricks up the Sleeve
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Villain》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: I have to say I've really enjoyed the sushi here… It's even better with some SAUCE!

name: Deathstroke Castle
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the left position of your center stage, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Villain》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Villain》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Gekihou Shell Assault Castle! Rapid-fire hundred cannons transformation!

name: Joker: Nemesis
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Villain》 characters, this card gets +2500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Villain》 character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Vivification" is in your climax area, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Villain》 characters from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: You don't dare kill me. Isn't that right, Bats?

name: Joker Balloon
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1《Villain》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When "Fusion of the Felons" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, and you have another "Two-Face Castle" and "Deathstroke Castle" and "Penguin Castle" and "Poison Ivy Castle", you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent, choose 1 level 3 or lower character facing this card, and put it into your opponent's clock. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Poison Ivy
text: 【CONT】 If you have another 《Villain》 character, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.
flavorText: I'll bury you in the dirt, you old buzzard!

name: Penguin: Weaponized Wagasa
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Villain》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose 1 character on your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.

name: Deathstroke
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to that character's soul ×1000.

name: Two-Face: Coxswained by the Coin
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Coin Toss" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, perform the following 2 effects in order. "Your opponent declares "Heads" or "Tails"." "Put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, if that card is level 1 or higher and your opponent declared "Heads", or that card is level 0 or lower and your opponent declared "Tails", choose up to 1 《Villain》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand." (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Sure… until the coin tells me otherwise.

name: Lord Joker
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Villain》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Everyone's been calling me Dairoku Tenmaou, the demon king! But you can call me...

name: Joker: Stealing the Limelight
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: You never want to be too early to a party… right?!

name: Joker: Sadistic
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: You liked that, didn't you?

name: Poison Ivy Castle
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if this card is in the right position of your back stage, your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1000 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Judoku Plant Castle! Multitudes of flowers transformation!

name: Bane
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1)] This card gets +2500 power until end of turn. At the end of turn, put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Dosukoi!

name: Joker: Samurai Swordfight
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of the encore step, if you do not have another 【REST】 character on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card.
flavorText: Oh, I'd hate to come to Ancient Japan and miss out on a samurai swordfight.

name: Joker: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if there are 3 or more climax in your opponent's waiting room, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Harley Quinn: Battle on the Big Boat" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Harley Quinn: Battle on the Big Boat" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: It's a shame they all had to die… so why don't you join them!

name: Penguin Castle
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the right position of your center stage, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax, if that card's trigger icon is 【TREASURE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.
flavorText: Chojin Birdman Castle! Wind, forest, fire, mountain transformation!

name: Joker: Amnesia?
flavorText: I know it sounds silly, but my wife and I are always saying, it's like we've been reborn.

name: Penguin
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if all of the other characters on your center stage are 【STAND】, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: Fly! My fine-feathered friends!

name: Deathstroke: Power Struggle
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.
flavorText: Interesting… Now we'll finally see who's the most powerful warlord in Japan.

name: Two-Face Castle
text: 【CONT】 If this card is in the left position of your back stage, all of your other 《Villain》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Your luck's run out.

name: Unyielding Fortitude
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have a 《Villain》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】."

name: Rock and a Hard Place
text: If you do not have a character with "Joker" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Your opponent may choose 1 level 2 or lower character on your opponent's back stage, and put it into his or her waiting room. If your opponent does not, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Oh terrible! You can come after me, or save that mother and child down below.

name: Efflorescence
text: Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -2500 power until end of turn. Choose 1 of your "Joker: Amnesia?", and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 "Joker: Nemesis" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on." Choose 1 of your "Harley Quinn: Amnesia?", and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【ACT】 [Put this card into your waiting room] Choose up to 1 "Harley Quinn: Bombs Away!" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on."

name: Exploding Barrel
text: Deal 4 damage to all players, and choose 1 level 3 or lower character on your opponent's center stage, and put it into his or her waiting room. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Batman: "You're insane! You'll kill yourself!"

name: Maniacal Feudal Lord
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Uhuhuhuhahahahahahaaa!

name: Fusion of the Felons
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Joker: "Criminals of Gotham…! Become, ONE!!"

name: Vivification
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【POOL】: When this card triggers, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock)
flavorText: Harley Quinn: "We did it! They're finally growing!"

name: Coin Toss
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 green card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Let's see... What will my next move be…?

name: Harley Quinn
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 cost 0 or lower 《Villain》 character with level equal to or lower than your level, put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Villain》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Can't wait, Mister J.

name: Harley Quinn: Partner in Crime
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Villain》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Heeheehaha!! Woohoo!!

name: Red Hood
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 1 card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 5 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: I'll give you the first shot.

name: Harley Quinn: Status Report
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Villain》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: He's beating the gunmen and our cannons!

name: Alfred
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I must admit, I've picked up quite a few new culinary ideas.

name: Robin
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Weapon》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Heey! Batman! Monkichi has another message.

name: Harley Quinn: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top X cards of your opponent's deck into his or her waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Villain》 characters you have. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: But how?! We killed you!

name: Red Hood: Tea Ceremony
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Weapon》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Gunslinger" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or higher, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: I can't wait to slaughter them all…

name: Harley Quinn: Mighty Hammer
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】【CXCOMBO】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Trigger Happy" is in your climax area, and you have another "Joker", you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: Uh!

name: Red Hood: Rooted Rancor
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, and put them on the top of his or her deck in the original order.
flavorText: I owe you this.

name: Giant Monkey
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you do not have "Monkey Horde" in your waiting room, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When "Bat Swarm" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Batman: Blast From the Past" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.

name: Harley Quinn: Party in the Clouds
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Villain》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Delirious Damsel" is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your other characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Villain》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."

name: Alfred: Dutiful Butler
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Batman Ninja" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Batman Ninja" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand) 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your "Batman Ninja", and that character gets +2000 and the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects."
flavorText: The wild game and produce here are exceptional. I'm planning a high-protein diet.

name: Monkey Horde
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Robin: "All for one, and one for all."

name: Robin: Reluctant Adieu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: It's time for me to go. I'll never forget you.

name: Red Robin
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: If they attack us with their mobile fortress, we will outmaneuver them and strike back with everything we've got.

name: Harley Quinn: Amnesia?
flavorText: We did it! They're finally blooming!

name: Red Robin: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)

name: Harley Quinn: "Doctor" Quinzel
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 character on your opponent's center stage, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Take your medicine kitty, kitty!

name: Red Robin: Tea Ceremony
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Weapon》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets -2 level while on the stage.
flavorText: Then it will truly earn the name, "The Field of Hell".

name: Harley Quinn: Bombs Away!
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Villain》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Villain》 characters, you may choose 1 《Villain》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: Ooohh!

name: Monkey Flute
text: Choose 1 of your 【STAND】 《Weapon》 characters, and 【REST】 it. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 "Monkey Horde", put them on separate positions of your stage, and shuffle your deck.

name: It Was a Disguise!
text: Choose 1 of your 《Villain》 characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room with level equal to or lower than your level with "Harley Quinn" in its card name, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Hi～!

name: Trigger Happy
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Oh!

name: Bat Swarm
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Joker: "HUH?!"

name: Delirious Damsel
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavorText: Hahahaa～ Hehhehh!

name: Gunslinger
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Catwoman: Reliable Ally
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Gotta love a man who can forgive a girl for double-crossing him.

name: Sengoku Batman
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Weapon》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I will be what the Bat Clan calls me. I will be their prophecy. I will be...

name: Catwoman
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Your Opponent's Right Here!" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to 1 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: You didn't expect me to leave empty-handed, did you?

name: Batman Ninja
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 1 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. At the end of this card's attack, if "The Dark Knight" is in your climax area, and all of your characters are 《Weapon》, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I will turn their legend into reality.

name: Batman: Missionary Disguise
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: What? I can't believe you didn't tell me, Selina.

name: Catwoman: Sly Deal
text: 【CONT】 If this card is on your stage, this card gets 《Villain》. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When a climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: Oh, I thought you might want this thingy.

name: Batman: Information Extraction
text: 【CONT】 If your stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 power.
flavorText: Who's your master?

name: Eian: Bat Clan Leader
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Weapon》 characters you have ×500.

name: Catwoman: Catfight
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Batman: Blast From the Past
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you do not have "Monkey Horde" in your waiting room, 【REST】 this card. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Bat Swarm" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Weapon》 characters, all of your characters get +500 power and +1 soul until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Joker: "B… B-B… Batman?"

name: Catwoman: Unimpressed
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Weapon》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Weapon》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavorText: Hm.

name: Batman: Batmobile
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose up to 4 cards in your waiting room, and put them face up underneath this card in any order as markers. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Anachronistic Gadgetry" is placed on your climax area, if you do not have another character, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 Sunder/"Batman: Batwing" [(2) Put 4 cards from your hand into your waiting room]" (At the end of this card's attack, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 marker of this card named "Batman: Batwing", put it on any position of your stage, and put this card and all markers underneath this card face up in any order underneath that character as markers)
flavorText: Harley Quinn: "Batman's here in his Batmobile!"

name: Batman: Ancient Grappling Hook
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and move it to an open position on your opponent's stage. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 character on your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.

name: Nightwing: Tea Ceremony
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you level up, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Weapon》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: All of the daimyo castles are on the move. This is our chance.

name: Gorilla Grodd: Assembling the Pieces
text: 【CONT】 If this card is on your stage, this card gets 《Villain》. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 characters with "Castle" in its card name, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: It's time to get down to business.

name: Bat Clan of Hida
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character with "Batman" in its card name is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: Harley Quinn: "What?! Ninja Batmen?!"

name: Bat Clan of Hida
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character with "Batman" in its card name is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: Harley Quinn: "What?! Ninja Batmen?!"

name: Bat Clan of Hida
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character with "Batman" in its card name is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: Harley Quinn: "What?! Ninja Batmen?!"

name: Bat Clan of Hida
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other character with "Batman" in its card name is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavorText: Harley Quinn: "What?! Ninja Batmen?!"

name: Catwoman: Back to the Present
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Weapon》 characters you have ×500. 【ACT】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets +1000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may draw 1 card."
flavorText: I always keep my eye out for.. interesting souvenirs.

name: Batman: The Final Showdown
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Let's end this, Joker. Just you and me.

name: Catwoman: Beguiling Maiden
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw 1 card, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: I really doubt the Joker cares about history.

name: Batman: Batcycle
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from the marker area of "Batman: Batwing", this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 Sunder/"Armored Batman" [(1)]"
flavorText: Not so fast.

name: Gorilla Grodd: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 characters on your back stage. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room..
flavorText: Raahhhhh!!!

name: Batman: Batwing
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from the marker area of "Batman: Batmobile", this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 Sunder/"Batman: Batcycle" [(1)]" 【ACT】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 3 characters from your stage into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Anachronistic Gadgetry" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Locked on target.

name: Batman: Sinking Ship
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Catwoman" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Catwoman" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: We have to abandon ship. Now!

name: Catwoman: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Elusive Kitty" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Weapon》 character, look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, and this card gets the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, you may return this card to your hand."
flavorText: Ever heard of a decoy?

name: Gorilla Grodd: Decoy
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Return this card to your hand] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Batman: Infiltration" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on as the defending character.
flavorText: Looks like this place agrees with you.

name: Eian: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot move to another position on the stage. 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your opponent's climax area, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: We cannot be shaken by your evil thoughts.

name: Nightwing: Coordinated Assault
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: Party's over, Penguin.

name: Armored Batman
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Weapon》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from the marker area of "Batman: Batcycle" , this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 Sunder/"Batman: Information Extraction" [(1)]"

name: Batman: Charitable Dealings
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Weapon》 characters get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: I'm sorry for my friend's behavior.

name: Batman: Infiltration
text: 【CONT】 If there are 1 or less characters on your back stage, this card cannot attack. 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."
flavorText: Maybe another time.

name: Catwoman: Surprise!
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card cannot become 【REVERSE】.
flavorText: I wanted to see the look of surprise on your face.

name: Nightwing
text: 【CONT】 If there are no markers underneath this card, this card gets -7500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Nightwing" in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker.

name: Donning the Mask
text: If you do not have a character with "Batman" in its card name, this card cannot be played from your hand. Search your deck for up to 2 《Weapon》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: I swear, their faith in me will not be squandered.

name: Quake Engine
text: If all players are level 3 or higher, all players put all cards from their clock into their waiting room. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Gorilla Grodd: "Now witness as I become master of time and space, and bend them to my will!

name: The Dark Knight
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: You can't trust everything you see, Joker.

name: Your Opponent's Right Here!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: Time for some girl-on-girl action!

name: Anachronistic Gadgetry
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Alfred: "There's no need to worry. The vehicle has been well maintained, Master Bruce."

name: Elusive Kitty
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: "Villain" Red Hood
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Weapon》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: BATMAN!!

name: "Villain" Robin
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: BATMAN!!

name: "Villain" Red Robin
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Weapon》 characters you have ×500.
flavorText: BATMAN!!

name: "Villain" Catwoman
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Weapon》 character, you may put it face up underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)
flavorText: BATMAN!!

name: "Villain" Gorilla Grodd
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of characters your opponent has ×500.
flavorText: BATMAN!!

name: "Villain" Nightwing
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: BATMAN!!

name: "Villain" Batman
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Weapon》 characters get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: BATMAN!!

name: Robin: Reluctant Adieu
text: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, you may draw 1 card.

name: Red Robin: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)

name: Gunslinger
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Batman: Missionary Disguise
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

name: Nightwing: Coordinated Assault
text: 【AUTO】 Bond/"Catwoman: Battle on the Big Boat" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 card named "Catwoman: Battle on the Big Boat" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Batman: Ancient Armor
text: 【AUTO】 CXCOMBO@ When this card attacks, if "Unleash the Bat!" is in your climax area, you may draw 1 card.

name: Batman: Information Extraction
text: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Catwoman: Battle on the Big Boat
Batman: Infiltration
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Donning the Mask
text: Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Weapon》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Unleash the Bat!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Batman: Back in Time
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Batman: Back in Time
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax revealed among those cards, this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Joker: Innate Insanity
text: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]". 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may draw 1 card. If your opponent does, your opponent chooses 1 card in your opponent's hand, and puts it into his or her waiting room.
flavorText: There isn't the same madness in his eyes. He could never hide that part of himself. It's what makes him what he is.

name: Red Robin: Reliable Ally
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Weapon》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place)

name: Robin: Reliable Ally
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is placed on your climax area, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, draw up to 1 card.
flavorText: Their combined spirit has formed this giant samurai!

name: Red Robin: Sinking Ship
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore" until end of turn. (You cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either)
flavorText: We need to go! She can't stay afloat much longer!

name: Red Hood: Dual-Wield
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Weapon》 character, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Red Hood: Information Extraction
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: Do you expect me to believe the Joker has taken up farming?!

name: Robin: Battle on the Big Boat
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 1 or lower, put it into your stock. (Otherwise, return it to its original place. Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: All-Out Attack
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.

name: Present Day Batman
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, all of your other "Present Day Catwoman" get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Present Day Catwoman" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Present Day Catwoman" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Shut it down, Grodd! It's over! You're finished!

name: Catwoman: Catlike Reflexes
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage.

name: Nightwing: Status Report
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Red Hood and Robin made the jump too.

name: Batman: Ancient Armor
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 characters on your back stage. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Unleash the Bat!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Weapon》 characters, draw up to 2 cards, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.
flavorText: If we're gonna win, it's time we finally played by those rules.

name: Present Day Catwoman
flavorText: Batman: "Catwoman, don't!"

name: Catwoman: Just Wanna Go Home
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Weapon》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Whatever it takes to get home…

name: Nightwing: Clash of the Avians
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Weapon》 characters.
flavorText: Hyyyyahhh!

name: Batman: Time-Traveller
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Weapon》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: Urghhh…!!

name: Catwoman: Feline Demeanor
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Weapon》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Weapon》 characters you have ×500.

name: Batman: The Prophesied Ninja
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if all of your characters are 《Weapon》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 this card.
flavorText: Eian: "Bat Clan, we have waited all our lives for this moment."

name: Clandestine Connections
text: Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Weapon》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I'm guessing you didn't invite me here just to join you for a hot soak.

name: Unleash the Bat!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: Dance in the Dark
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
